interfaceRec.name: ICustomEventDispatcher
interfaceRec.description:
This interface helps to generalize objects, for example stored runtime in an array or so, to call the very helpful removeAllEventListeners function.

It is required to extends Shared.EventDispatcher to implement this interface

interfaceRec.name: ICustomWritable
interfaceRec.description: Adds the textvalue to a component. Makes possible to implement writable components and access them runtime via arrays or lists or other runtime build references.

interfaceRec.name: ICustomSelectable
interfaceRec.description:
This interface is for accessing information of any selectable component. These components are generally used within questions. It allows the program to iterate the references and look for already selected Objects. Instead of overwriting the synchronize() function in each new question class, you just have to assure it implements this interface.

By using this, it is possible to implement a radio button or check box behavior for an image or other visual components, without extending these classes

interfaceRec.name: ICustomModule
interfaceRec.description: Defines the minimal criteria for a class to be a module. This makes it possible for the MainAppManager to load any Module with the same abstract sequence of instructions.

method.name: getClassDefinition
method.description: Returns a String of the module class plus the package name. Ensure to change their names, when refactor.

method.name: load
method.description:
Loading the module.

Connect the modules internal variables with data from GlobalSettings, TestCollections and Session. Usually there are only some of them needed, so not all the modules will behave like in the following description.

loads debug states, url paths to data on the server, and text for labels from globalsettings

loads the collection of possible dimensions, levels and the associated items as Strings

loads actual session states. These can include actual dimension, actual level and actual item.

method.name: returnLoadFinishedEvent
method.description: Event const cannot be accessed via get, therefore we use this method, to enable addEventListener(anyModuleInstance.returnLoadFinishedEvent())

method.name: returnModuleFinishedEvent
method.description: Event const cannot be accessed via get, therefore we use this method, to enable addEventListener(anyModuleInstance.returnModuleFinishedEvent())

method.name: returnView
method.description: To access the private view component only via referencs, instead of direct access.

method.name: sendTweenFinished
method.description: Tells the module, that the screen is visible and specific actions can be performed now.

method.name: unload
method.description:
Unloads all contained and related objects of a module. Removes all event listeners if possible and sets all objects and relations to null.

Therefore all related objects of a module should be stored in an array calles references.

method.name: debug
method.description:
Set the Debugging state to true.

Enables to determine errors without sourcecode by showing alertboxes, if an error occurs

method.name: soundMode
method.description:
Sets sound to on or off

Enables to use application without sound errors, ideal for rapid item development and debug

interfaceRec.name: IClickableComponent
interfaceRec.description:
Defines the minimum criteria to be clickable and refer to any object, which many of the buttons need in this app.

There are many different Types of buttons in this application, many of them have refer to a sound and therefore we need to generalize the properties of a button which makes ist possible to play a sound by clickign itr dragging it

method.name: referringTo
method.description: Get the reference to a specific sound object.

method.name: visibleReference
method.description: Get the reference to a specific visible object like an image.

method.name: referringTo
method.description: Set the reference to a specific sound object.

method.name: visibleReference
method.description: Set the reference to a specific visible object like an image.

method.name: StaticMath
method.description: A collection of static functions, calculating things you might need somewhere.

method.name: getRandomSquarePosition
method.description: This is a full working shuffle function. It auto-increases the y-bounds, if there is no more possible placement of an element. The max effort is n, before the bounds will increase.
method.param: width the width of the current element, which will be compared with the others
height the height of the current element, which will be compared with the others
boundx the maxwidth of the elements target container
boundy the maxheight of the elements targetcontainer
compare the array of all elements to compare with
maxIndex the maximum amount of steps in the compare loop. assume there are only a few elements with a position set before, so the loop breaks at those who still have not obtained a position.

method.name: square2squareHit
method.description: Square to Square hit test working by exclusion, which is more performant for the case, that usually there would be no collision.

method.name: afterFirst
method.param: p_string The string.
p_begin The character or sub-string.

method.name: afterLast
method.param: p_string The string.
p_char The character or sub-string.

method.name: beforeFirst
method.param: p_string The string.
p_begin The character or sub-string.

method.name: beforeLast
method.param: p_string The string.
p_begin The character or sub-string.

method.name: beginsWith
method.param: p_string The string that the prefix will be checked against.
p_begin The prefix that will be tested against the string.

method.name: between
method.param: p_string The string.
p_start The character or sub-string to use as the start index.
p_end The character or sub-string to use as the end index.

method.name: block
method.param: p_string The string to break up.
p_len Maximum length of each block of text.
p_delim delimter to end text blocks on, default = '.'

method.name: capitalize
method.param: p_string The string.

p_all (optional) Boolean value indicating if we should
capitalize all words or only the first.

method.name: contains
method.param: p_string The string.
p_char The character or sub-string we are looking for.

method.name: countOf
method.param: p_string The string.
p_char The character or sub-string to count.

p_caseSensitive (optional, default is true) A boolean flag to indicate if the
search is case sensitive.

method.name: editDistance
method.param: p_source The source string.
p_target The target string.

method.name: endsWith
method.param: p_string The string that the suffic will be checked against.
p_end The suffix that will be tested against the string.

method.name: hasText
method.param: p_string The string to check.

method.name: isEmpty
method.param: p_string The string to check

method.name: isNumeric
method.param: p_string The string.

method.name: padLeft
method.param: p_string String to pad
p_padChar Character for pad.
p_length Length to pad to.

method.name: padRight
method.param: p_string String to pad
p_padChar Character for pad.
p_length Length to pad to.

method.name: properCase
method.param: p_string The string to check

method.name: quote
method.param:
p_string The string that will be checked for instances of remove
string

method.name: removeExtraWhitespace
method.param: p_string The String whose extraneous whitespace will be removed.

method.name: remove
method.param:
p_string The string that will be checked for instances of remove
string
p_remove The string that will be removed from the input string.
p_caseSensitive An optional boolean indicating if the replace is case sensitive. Default is true.

method.name: reverseWords
method.param: p_string The String that will be reversed.

method.name: reverse
method.param: p_string The String that will be reversed.

method.name: similarity
method.param: p_source The source string.
p_target The target string.

method.name: stripTags
method.param: p_string The source string.

method.name: swapCase
method.param: p_string The source string.

method.name: trimLeft
method.param: p_string The String whose beginning whitespace will be removed.

method.name: trimRight
method.param: p_string The String whose ending whitespace will be removed.

method.name: trim
method.param:
p_string The String whose beginning and ending whitespace will
will be removed.

method.name: truncate
method.param: p_string The string.
p_len The length the string should be shortend to
p_suffix (optional, default=...) The string to append to the end of the truncated string.

method.name: wordCount
method.param: p_string The string.

classRec.name: CustomModuleEvents
classRec.description: An event class for passing session related values via event. Especially useful if you want to avoid to code this into an interface (and therefore into all other module classes).

method.name: CustomModuleEvents
method.description: Constructor, calls superclass and passes parameters.
method.param: _userDataUrl the passed user id
_itemString the id of the actual item, used to determine the successor item
_timeStamp the timestamp needed for writing the files on the server in order to the actual time
_level the chosen level of the testcollection
_dimension the chosen dimension of the testcollection
_isNext determines if the following module is an item, if true, the next module should be an item AND the item id to load will be dtermined by _itemString
updated contains the updated item xml (after an item was completed). ready to be sent to the server

field.name: MODULE_FINISHED
field.description: Declares the state of being ready to unload. Related to any module.

classRec.name: EventDispatcher
classRec.description:
This class overrides the eventdispatcher to allow a removal of all eventListeners of an Object.
Idea and concept by Justin Shacklette, Copyright holds Justin Shacklette www.saturnboy.com

classRec.name: ErrorDispatcher
classRec.description: Static class. Prepares a custom error type to be send to server which writes an error log

method.name: processNewError
method.description: creates an sends a new error message by combining the parameters and adding a timestamp. Then a urlloader will be created to request the specific php script which will write the message into a log file.
method.param: error custom number of error type
description custom description of error type
flashErrorId original falsh error id
causedBy the source of the error
line the module and if important also the line (line is usually useless, due to continual development)
scriptUrl the url to the php script
navigate for debugging, shows the target url

classRec.name: MyBase64Decoder
classRec.description: A utility class to decode a Base64 encoded String to a ByteArray. Extends Shared.EventDispatcher to dispatch and remove events dynamically

method.name: MyBase64Decoder
method.description: Constructor.

method.name: decode
method.description: Decodes a Base64 encoded String and adds the result to an internal buffer. Subsequent calls to this method add on to the internal buffer. After all data have been encoded, call toByteArray() to obtain a decoded flash.utils.ByteArray.
method.param: encoded The Base64 encoded String to decode.

method.name: reset
method.description: Clears all buffers and resets the decoder to its initial state.

method.name: toByteArray
method.description: Returns the current buffer as a decoded flash.utils.ByteArray. Note that calling this method also clears the buffer and resets the decoder to its initial state.

classRec.name: StaticFunctions
classRec.description:
This Class contains a set of static functions which will be called by any class in the project.
Its a kind of collection of generic functions.

method.name: check_exists
method.description: Function for Debugging
method.param: x Can be any object, class whatever, important: Classpath needed!
method.returns: A boolean value true if object exists.

method.name: fadeOutSound
method.description: Provides a smooth fade out for all now-running sound files.

method.name: makeVisible
method.description: Can make display components visible or invisible.

method.name: resize
method.description: Provides a tween animation for resizing Display Objects.
method.param: obj The object which needs to be resized. (important: obj must be a view component)
targetWidth The desired width of the object
type Describes in which way the object will be resized. Options: smaller bigger mirror smallerToZero

method.name: tweenAlpha
method.description:
This animation tween is used to fade in and out but will only work on components wihtout children whose alpha value is used between 0 and 1.
This would cause that those values will be manipulated as well! The components will loose their smooth gradient fashioned look. So be careful if you use this method.
method.param: obj The Object which will be faded. Important is, that you only use Display Objects ().
type the type of the tween animation

field.name: sizeX
field.description: for resizeX method

field.name: staticDispatcher
field.description: Allows a static class to dispatch Events dynamically.

field.name: targets
field.description: Pointer on multiple Object to use within a method of this class.

field.name: target
field.description: Pointer on a single Object to use within multple methods (especially event driven methods).

classRec.name: MP3Audio
classRec.description: Creates a new wrapper for loaded mp3 files. Can handle all required events for a common mp3 player like play, pause, stop etc. The underlying data structure is a Sound Object.

method.name: MP3Audio
method.description: Constructor. Requires an url to load an mp3 from an external source. events will be auto-build.
method.param: _scriptUrl the path to the include script on the server
relPath the relative path to the mp3 object
id allows to set an id for accessing objects at runtime
navigate for debug purposes, navigates to url of the include script

method.name: pause
method.description: manually pauses the sound object.

method.name: playAudio
method.description:
opens the soundchannel and adds the playing soundobject to it. enabled to autodetect, when the soundobject finished playing. isPlaying will be set to true.
Does nothing if the sound object is null. This can happen for example if the unload method was called external or internal when an error occured.

method.name: returnIsPlaying
method.description: return if the underlying sound object is in playing state
method.returns: Boolean isPlaying true if playing false if not

method.name: returnProgress
method.description: returns a progress value for external objects to access the loading state of the sound object
method.returns: Number a percent value as a number

method.name: setDebug
method.description: lets an external class set this state to debugMode, allows to show alert boxes on screen

method.name: stop
method.description: stops a sound.

method.name: unload
method.description: unloads soundObject related events and the object itself.

classRec.name: XMLWriter
classRec.description:
XML writer Class
Version: 0.1.2
DOC: 09.11.2010
Author: Jan Kster
Last Update: 12.01.2011
Description:
Similar to XLoader, this Class is made for connecting to php but sending data instead of retreiving data.

method.name: XMLWriter
method.description: Constructor with presettings of parameters. The parameters representing the values which are required to make PHP write a new XML document with the correct information.
method.param: _xml The complete item XML File (required, cannot be null)
_date The timestamp, given by the itemObject
_name the complete Document name to be written
_user the user name / iD (default ID is test)
_param there are different types of php scripts, whhich can be requested, the parameter indicates which specific script will be called.

method.name: send_urlReq
method.description: In this method, a variables object willl be created to store all data in one object. In php you will be able to refer to it, by accessing the _POST['variables.something'] array. Depending on the param variable, different scripts will be loaded.

classRec.name: HorizontalMultilineLayout
classRec.description:
Lays out elements the same way as text area positions words: putting them in
one line and going to next line when there is no space for new word.
copyright: Maxim Kachurovskiy
http://cookbooks.adobe.com/post_Horizontal_Multiline_Layout-17807.html
Code is modified by Jan Kuester, University of bremen jank87
classRec.tzi.de:
Modification: Layout-in-Row --> Text can be aligned into middle, top or bottom align in each line,
Text can be aligned by the measurements of a source element (e.g. an image) in each line, Text can be aligned by a fixed
pixel value in each line.

classRec.name: CustomImage
classRec.description: Basic class which automatically loads an image from url and catches errors as well as allows a dynamic adding or removing of eventlisteners. Be aware, that it requires the data as a base64 string.

method.name: CustomImage
method.description: Constructor. Requires an url and a relative path to the image file. Will automatically loads the image as a base64 string and decodes it to an image source.
method.param: scripturl the url to the script which loads the image
relPath the path parameter passed to the url via POST
navigate for debugging purposes, navigates to the url of the script

method.name: setDebug
method.description: sets the debug value to the desired value true or fals
method.param: value the new value for the components debugmode

classRec.name: CustomButton
classRec.description:
An extended Button class, implementing the minimum criteria for linking to other objects and removeAllEventListeners function.

Most buttons in this Application will extend this

method.name: CustomButton
method.description: empty constructor

method.name: referringTo
method.description: get the reference to the linked object

method.name: visibleReference
method.description: gets a reference to a linked visible object

method.name: referringTo
method.description: sets a reference to a linked object

method.name: visibleReference
method.description: sets a reference to a linked visible object

classRec.name: LoaderManagement
classRec.description: A static class, representing a sequence to arrange the required modules in a predefined order.

method.name: LoaderManagement
method.description: constructor is empty

method.name: getNext2Load
method.description: Iterates a sequence of module class names and tries to find matches.
method.param: moduleName the name of the current module to match with the sequence
nextitem is a parameter which indeicated, that there is still an item in the load queue
method.return: Returns a String-Name of the Class definition, which makes the module accessable via getClassByDefinition.

classRec.name: MainAppManager
classRec.description: The core controller class. Manages the loading and unloading of the modules as well as the communication between them and the model related data. Modules a loaded by name, their functions are accessed via ICustomModule interface. The view component of the modules get connected with the DisplayManager
classRec.author: Jan Kster

method.name: MainAppManager
method.description: Constructor, no parameters.

method.name: getView
method.description: Returns a reference to the view component, owned by the current module instance.
method.author: Jan Kster
method.return: Object view object, usually a group based mxml component

method.name: sendTweenComplete
method.description: Sends to the module instance, that the display tween is finished. This ensures a delay of starting animations or scripts until the new screen is visible.

classRec.name: StartAppObject
classRec.description: First module, loaded after initialization of the application. Includes a VideoPlayer for introducing the applications funcionalities.

method.name: StartAppObject
method.description: Constructor

field.name: view
field.description: The view component, which will be linked to the display.

classRec.name: TestFinishedObject
classRec.description: After finishing a test, this Class is loaded to provide functions for printing the evaluation and choosing the further activities.

method.name: TestFinishedObject
method.description: empty constructor

classRec.name: LoginObject
classRec.description:
Represents a login form handler. User input will be sent to the server, server evaluates and answers with a value. The value influences the state of the handler and
either a login is performed or fault or a new user code is requestet.

method.name: LoginObject
method.description: constructor. No variables will be pased. Initializes view component.

method.name: load
method.description: Extracts the urls and paths from the globals model and prepares the http service for server request.
method.param: _globals the global settings lib object, storing all labels and paths for the application
_tcollection the testcollection lib object, not used in this class
_session the session lib object, not used in this class

method.name: requestData
method.description: This method starts the http request.

method.name: returnUserData
method.description: For other objects, to retrieve userdata url.

method.name: sendTweenFinished
method.description: not required in this class

classRec.name: OverviewObject
classRec.description: the handler class for an overview, where users will choose their next testcollection by choosing a dimension and the corresponding level.

method.name: OverviewObject
method.description: constructor, initializes view component.

method.name: getClassDefinition
method.description: returns the package and calass name as a string to allow search within the loader management

method.name: load
method.description: loads path urls and labels from globals. Makes a reference to testcollection, because we need this later for session building.
method.param: _globals reference to the globals lib
_tcollection reference to the testcollection lib
_session reference to the session lib, not used in this class

method.name: returnLoadFinishedEvent
method.description: allows adding event listeners because get function will not work for constants

method.name: returnModuleFinishedEvent
method.description: allows adding event listeners because get function will not work for constants

method.name: returnView
method.description: Returns a reference to the view component.

method.name: sendTweenFinished
method.description: not used in this class

method.name: unload
method.description: cleanup event listeners and references

method.name: debug
method.description: gets debug value

method.name: soundMode
method.description: gets sounddebug value

method.name: debug
method.description: sets debug value

method.name: soundMode
method.description: sets sounddebug value

field.name: LOAD_COMPLETE
field.description: representing the event, where this class has finished the loading process

classRec.name: DisplayManager
classRec.description: The DisplayManager is one of the core classes to provide a management all visual components. This allows the MainAppmanager to include or remove specific view components of a module.

method.name: DisplayManager
method.description: Constructor, no args. Set the default size of the wrapper.

method.name: removeContent
method.description: clears the screen.

method.name: setContent
method.description: Links the Displaymanager with the viewcomponent of the actual module.
method.param: ob an object reference to the actual module
_title defined, wether the tween is the title screen or a normal alpha tween
method.see: layer the image which will be faded to alpha 0

field.name: DISPLAY_TWEENEDOUT
field.description: Event Const for dispatching status of tweened out / fade out complete.

field.name: inheritedObj
field.description: The target object, which will be dispalyed on the screen.

classRec.name: BasicEnumeration
classRec.description: Basic grid of an enumeration.

method.name: BasicEnumeration
method.description: Constructor.

method.name: getNumber
method.description: Get the ordinal number of an enum-.

method.name: getValue
method.description: Get the String value of an enum.

classRec.name: UrlTypeEnum
classRec.description: Collection of enumeration ids, to access globals parameters. They are hardcoded, so changes in this file will require changes in the globals file and vice versa.

method.name: UrlTypeEnum
method.description: Constructor.
method.param: newValue the string value, represented by the enumeration.
newOrdinal the position in the sequence of the enumeration.

method.name: selectByValue
method.description: looks for an enumeration by a passed string value. Returns null of not found.

method.name: list
method.description: returns an array with all enums.

field.name: INCLUDE_SCRIPT
field.description: The relative path to the includescript. Must be combined with ROOT to a full usable url

field.name: ITEM
field.description: The relative path to the itemData directories. Must be combined with ROOT.

field.name: ROOT
field.description:
Represents the root url on the server. It must be a realtive path to the root directory of this application and will be combined with other paths to load specific data or scripts

Example: http://mydomain.subdomain.com/apps/thisapp/

field.name: SOUNDS
field.description: The relative path to the application sounds on the serve. Does not include item sounds. Must be combined with ROOT.

field.name: USER
field.description: The relative path to the userData directories. Must be combined with ROOT.

classRec.name: ErrorTypeEnum
classRec.description: Enumeration of error types to indicate the number and the type of the error.

method.name: ErrorTypeEnum
method.description: Constructor.

method.name: selectByValue
method.description: looks for an enumeration by a passed string value. Returns null of not found.

method.name: list
method.description: returns an array with all enums.

classRec.name: PHPParameterTypeEnum
classRec.description: Collection of enumeration ids, to access php parameters. They are hardcoded, so changes in this file will require changes in the include php file and vice versa.

method.name: PHPParameterTypeEnum
method.description: Constructor. See extended class.

method.name: selectByValue
method.description: looks for an enumeration by a passed string value. Returns null of not found.

method.name: list
method.description: returns an array with all enums.

field.name: CREATE_NEW_USER
field.description: The parametername to access the newUser script in the php include file.

field.name: GET_AUDIO
field.description: The parametername to access the getAudio script in the php include file.

field.name: GET_IMAGE
field.description: The parametername to access the getImage script in the php include file.

field.name: GET_ITEM_DATA
field.description: The parametername to access the getItem script in the php include file.

field.name: GET_USERDATA
field.description: The parametername to access the getUser script in the php include file.

field.name: LOGIN
field.description: The parameter name to access the loginScript in the php include file.

field.name: SEND_ERROR_MESSAGE
field.description: The parametername to access the sendError script in the php include file.

field.name: SEND_FINAL_XML
field.description: The parametername to access the sendFinalXml script in the php include file.

field.name: UPDATE_USER
field.description: The parametername to access the updateUser script in the php include file.

classRec.name: Dimension
classRec.description: This class represents a dimension or subject with all its included data.

method.name: Dimension
method.description: Constructor

method.name: addCollectionToList
method.description: adds a collection object to the collection list. useful if once the collection is created out of an xmllist.

method.name: addToCollectionList
method.description: adds an xmllist to the collection list. usually a collection is stored as an xml file, so it can be decoded by itering an xmllis.

method.name: getDescription
method.description: returns the description of this dimension

method.name: getName
method.description: returns the name of this dimension

method.name: getSoundUrl
method.description: returns the soundurl of this dimension

method.name: returnCollectionAt
method.description: returns a specific collection by passing an index number as parameter.
method.param: index the index of the desired collection

method.name: returnCollection
method.description: returns the entire collectionList as an array

classRec.name: Collection
classRec.description: A class representing one testcollection of a dimension / subject.

method.name: Collection
method.description: Constructor.
method.param: _name the name of the difficulty level
des description of this collection and level
method.soundurl: url to the sound file, related with the description text

method.name: addItems
method.description: adds an xmllist of items and excerps the itemnumbers. Stored in a common array.

method.name: getDescription
method.description: returns the description text of this collection

method.name: getName
method.description: returns the level of the collection

method.name: getSound
method.description: reutrns the soundurl of this collection

method.name: returnItemAt
method.description: reuturns an itemnumber at a specific index. Usefull if you desire the nth-item of the collection.

method.name: returnItems
method.description: returns the array of items

classRec.name: Session
classRec.description: This is a Data Structure, where each session for one item is stored. In detail, it stores the slected dimension, level and item. This ensures, that application always knows, where the user is at the moment.

classRec.name: UserObject
classRec.description: This class represents the login session of a certain user. The information are stored temporarily and usually written in an xml file which will be permanently send to the server.

method.name: UserObject
method.description: Constructor, initializes the URLLoader but does not call its load() function.
method.param: scriptUrl the include script (php) on the server
_id the user id from the login
navigate2url for debugging purposes, opens the navigated url in a new tab or window to enable a view of php echos or error messages

method.name: load
method.description: First adds variables to the URLLoader to define the parameter for the include script and the Post variable userid then starts the request.

method.name: startSession
method.description: Constructs a new entry for the actual Dimension and level, chosen by the user into. Calls the private updateUserXML(scriptUrl) function, to send the updated xml to php.
method.param: itemList An array of all item names within the chosen dimension and level
dimension the chosen dimension or sometimes called subject
level the level of difficulty
scriptUrl the directlink to the php script, which will handle the data

method.name: updateSession
method.description:
Updates a session by adding an entry at the data attribute of the item tag. (After item was completed) The entry consists of the userName, the timestamp and the itemnumber and the ending .xml.

This sequence will also be the name of the immediate path to the completed item xml file, which usually will be placed in the same directory as the user xml file

Calls the private function updateUserXML(scriptUrl) to send the data to the server.

method.name: _userData
method.description: returns the userdata as an xml object
method.returns: user data file as an xml object

classRec.name: Globals
classRec.description:
This class is a model for all global settings like paths and labels.

The globals.xml file will be analysed and the particular data will be stored in different arrays

method.name: Globals
method.description: Constructor. Http Service will be set up.

method.name: returnLabelValue
method.description:
returns a specific label by comparing the id of the path.
Usually it will ba an UrlTypeEnum but it can also be any string.

method.name: returnPathValue
method.description:
returns a specific path by comparing the id of the path.
Usually it will ba an UrlTypeEnum but it can also be any string.

method.name: debugMode
method.description: returns a boolean value, whether debug is enabled or disabled

method.name: labels
method.description: reutns all labels stored in an array

method.name: paths
method.description: returns all paths stored in an array

method.name: soundIgnore
method.description: returns a boolean value, whether sound is enabled or disabled

method.name: labels
method.description: writing to labels

method.name: paths
method.description: writing to paths

classRec.name: TestCollection
classRec.description:
This class loads the xml with the contained information about subjects, levels and item IDs and parse it into an XMLLIST.

The data is read-only and will be written only once when the class will be initialized

To overwirte the data, the class must be unloaded and be instanciated again

method.name: TestCollection
method.description: constructor, immediately initializes http service and loads the testcollection from the related Url
method.param: _relUrl the relative path to the xml file on the server, will be combined with the url String

method.name: getALLDimensions
method.description: Returns a reference to the data.
method.return: XMLList the testcollection data as an XMLList

method.name: getDimensionAt
method.description: Returns a specific Dimension with all its related levels and items.
method.param: index the number of one of the four possible dimensions. See your testcollection xml to determine which number represents which dimension.
method.return: if found it returns the appropiate dimension as a Dimension object, if not it returns an empty Dimension object dummy.

method.name: getDimensionByName
method.description: Returns a specific Dimension with all its related levels and items, determined by its name.
method.param: name the name of one of the four possible dimensions.
method.return: if found it returns the appropiate dimension as a Dimension object, if not it returns an empty Dimension object dummy.

method.name: getDimensionName
method.description: Returns the name of a dimension at a given index.
method.param: index the specific index of a dimension, ranges within [0..3]
method.return: String the name of the dimension as a String value

method.name: getLevelName
method.description: Returns the name of a level at a given index.
method.param: index the specific index of a dimension, ranges within the amount of levels
method.return: String the name of the level as a String value

method.name: http_onFault
method.description: dispatched an error event and unloads the service.

method.name: http_onResult
method.description: unloads the service and converts the result into an xmllist object. Dispatched a complete event.

method.name: searchNextItem
method.description: Tries to find the item number of the follwer item. If nothing is found, the actual item was the last one within the current level.
method.param: currentDimension the current dimension, usually stored in a session object or sent by a custommodule event
currentLevel the current level, usually stored in a session object or sent by a custommodule event
currentItem the current item, usually stored in a session object or sent by a custommodule event
method.return: String if found, the next item id as a String, else null

classRec.name: ItemEvent
classRec.description: Defines a set of events realted to the item object and its children. Also stores the result xml of the actual item, in order to pass it to other handlers.

method.name: ItemEvent
method.description: constructor, calls superclass.
method.param: required: type the name of the event type, see the event constants
bubbles bubbles on or off
cancelable cancelable on or off
_dataObject the dataobject containing the finished item xml, ready to get sent to the server

classRec.name: xmlLoader
classRec.description:
XML Loader Class
Version: 0.1.6
DOC: 02.11.2010
Author: Jan Kster
Last Update: 09.11.2010

classRec.name: ItemObject
classRec.description: Represents a handler for all item releated actions.

method.name: ItemObject
method.description: Constructor, will only be used by first instantiation.bla
method.param: relative_url the relative path to the applications root directory on the server
item_ID alias for itemnumber -> combined with relative_url will result in path to item data
userNumber user number for writing in user folder and xml

method.name: buildXML
method.description:
constructs a new xml copy of the origin by constructing the different elements in right order.
Be sure that you really have to change this, if you change the xml structure.

method.name: check_exists
method.description: useless but still somewhere in the code

method.name: createQuestions
method.description:
loads the correct question type by reading the "meta" tag from the item xml
content from question object will be displayed as components of view.qwrapper

method.name: evaluation
method.description:
Places all the possible marks in the marking section of the xml, by receiving results from the getMark method.
Be aware, that if you really have to change this, you will have to change the xml structure as well.

method.name: getMark
method.description:
This function grabs the user input information and tries to compare the input with the correct response.
For different question types, different rules of comparison will apply, so we need to ask for ALL possible rules. See detailed comments within the method-code.
Be sure that you really have to change this, if you change the xml structure.
method.param: itNumber the item id which shall be calculated.

method.name: load
method.description: Like in the most Classes, this class has a load method seperated from the constructor to ensure a successfull event listener setup.

method.name: makeQVisible
method.description:
In this event driven method, the target is searched in the refernces Array and if found, reduced to
the minimum size to ensure a correct display of the questions view component.

method.name: nextFlagNoSound
method.description: ONLY if soundIgnoreMode is switched to ON!

method.name: onCompleteHandler
method.description:
After a successfull xmlresult the method will fetch all required information for further process.
The Instructional Part of the XML will be read and the relaevant Objects (text,images, buttons) will be created.
Be sure that you change this well, if you change the xml structure. All display components will be load at once but displayed in a different manner. Some Items will implement
a prescreen, watch out for the different implementations for prescreen and instruction part.

method.name: onItemFinished
method.description: If User finishes an item, this function will be called by event and evaluates the user inputs to prepare writing the xml-.

method.name: playAudio
method.description: This Method is called by a MouseEvent event to trigger the playAudio() function of a MP3Audio class referred by a SoundButton.

method.name: sendTweenFinished
method.description: tells the class, that the screen is tweened

method.name: set_value
method.description: Old, not used.

method.name: unload
method.description: removes all eventlisteners from all stored objects and sets them to null

method.name: updateSeconds
method.description: Timer for simulating a realtime clock to ensure correct timeStamp entries.

field.name: visibleFlagsCollector
field.description: Referencing to already visible components to avoid multiple function call

classRec.name: QuestionsObject
classRec.description:
Defines the basic structure and bahvior of a question object. The detailed behavior like load and display data is defined in each of the extending quesion classes.

A special feature is the load content by page behavior. All Data will be loaded immediately after calling the specific questionspage and will be unloaded by calling another questionpage. This frees memory and enables a fluid application.

method.name: QuestionsObject
method.description: Constructor of each questions object contains a xmlList source (of questions) and the relative url path for loading data. Also initializes the view component.
method.param: _source the source xmllist containing the item data, defined in each item xml document
scripturl the realtive url the php script which is required to load and store data

method.name: answerExists
method.description: iterates the answer array to check if an anser was already given to a specific field. This allows a reload of a previous page with pre-existing answer settings.

method.name: displayQuestions
method.description: This function is the main process for displaying the content. It will vary for each Questionsobject, so it need to be overridden.

method.name: getAnswerString
method.description: returns the answervalue, if value is a string

method.name: getAnswerValue
method.description: checks, if a value in the answer array was already given by comparing the ids.

method.name: hasAtLeastOneListener
method.description: Because this Class is extending Shared.EventDispatcher, we can check if the listeners array is filled with at least one reference to a listener object. This may be required to check if an object's listener is removable.

method.name: load
method.description: initialization of the xmllist content. Need to be called seperately, because of EventListeners in Parent Object.

method.name: nextQpage
method.description: This Method loops the reference array, searching for the Radiobutton Reference and get its ID and selection status. These information represents the user input and is fundamental for evaluation. Evaluation is always done in ItemObject. The clear screen behavior is not defined here but rather the change of the qpState.

method.name: playAudio
method.description: This method is called by event and plays the audio file (MP3Audio), the specific SoundButton is referring to. The reference to the audio file is created in the displayQuestions() method.

method.name: prevQpage
method.description:
This method is like an undo function. Important to know: allAnswers.pop() will delete the input on the previous
questionpage and substitude it with the new input.
The clear screen behavior is not defined here but rather the change of the qpState.

method.name: removeQuestions
method.description:
This method initially loops the references Array and checks if the reference has listeners or is a specific object.
Listeners will be removed, Objects will be set to null.

method.name: synchronize
method.description: This function is required to synchronize the answer arrays with the new answers every time a questionpage was build.

method.name: _qpState
method.description: Get the current questionspage state.

method.name: _moduleState
method.description: Set the current module state. Important for finishing the questions and evaluate the answers in the parent object.

method.name: _qpState
method.description: Set the current questionpage state.

field.name: _listeners
field.description: managing listeners (for parent object)

field.name: allAnswers
field.description: Stores the summary of all answers arrays (all answers of all questionpages)

field.name: answers
field.description: Stores information about the recent user input, this Array is used temporary for each questionpage.

field.name: moduleState
field.description: The state of the module.

field.name: qpState
field.description: This States affects only internal processes --> next page / previous page

field.name: references
field.description: stores references to all the question related instances to ensure removing

field.name: relUrl
field.description: relative url path for loading data

field.name: source
field.description: xml source data, received from itemObject

classRec.name: MultipleChoice
classRec.description: Represents the process of loading, arranging and displaying data within a multiple choice item. The data model is a checkbox group, which allows one or many or all selected choices as an answer.

method.name: MultipleChoice
method.description: constructor, calls superclass.

method.name: displayQuestions
method.param: param the number of the questionpage. 0 means page 1

classRec.name: SingleChoice
classRec.description: Representing the process of loading, arranging and displaying data within a single choice item. The data model is a radiobutton group, whcih allows only one choice per question.

method.name: displayQuestions
method.description:
Displays a vertical set of Radiobuttons and Labels according to the specific questionspage, determined by the parameter.
Optional there can be an image and or a sound button before the answertext.
method.param: param the number of the page

classRec.name: ScCloud
classRec.description: Provides a cloud of radiobuttons and labels to click. The positions within the cloud will be chosen randomly and the cloud can increase its size by having trouble with positioning elements due to limited space.

method.name: ScCloud
method.description: constructor calls superclass.

classRec.name: Cloze
classRec.description: Representing the loading, arranging and displaying data for a cloze text.

method.name: Cloze
method.description: constructor, calls superclass.
method.param: _source see QuestionsObject
scripturl see QuestionsObject
relativeUrl see QuestionsObject

method.name: displayQuestions
method.description:
loads the certain data and displays it in a way of a text with empty text areas and soundbuttons.

it uses the modified HorizontalMultilineLayout to arrange the elements in a row

the Text will be completely split up, so every single word as well as the input area is encapsulated by a Group and can be Designed with css properties.
method.param: param the parameter indicates which questionpage is actually displayed

classRec.name: SelectAndWrite
classRec.description: Represents the process of loading, arrangin and displaying data for a selection of images and a textarea.

method.name: SelectAndWrite
method.description: Constructor, calls superclass.
method.param: _source the xmllist source file
scripturl path to the php script for loading images, mp3 and other data
relativeUrl the equivalent to rooturl

method.name: displayQuestions
method.description:
loads all required data, according to a specific questionspage.

Builds questions instruction first

loads images and arranges them in a rectangle shaped group of four images

creates a textinput area next to the images group

classRec.name: SelectableImage
classRec.description: A simple extension of an image, inmplementing the selectable idea. This image can be uses with others to simulate an image based single- or multiple choice construct.

method.name: SelectableImage
method.description: Constructor.

method.name: hovered
method.description: access the hovered property

method.name: selected
method.description: access the selected property

method.name: hovered
method.description: set this component to the hovered status, which will also change the appearance to a colored border.

method.name: selected
method.description: set this component to the selected status, which will also change the appearance to a colored border.

method.name: allowDomain
method.description:
Calls Security.allowDomain() for the SWF associated with this IFlexModuleFactory
plus all the SWFs assocatiated with RSLs preLoaded by this IFlexModuleFactory.

method.name: allowInsecureDomain
method.description:
Calls Security.allowInsecureDomain() for the SWF associated with this IFlexModuleFactory
plus all the SWFs assocatiated with RSLs preLoaded by this IFlexModuleFactory.

method.name: preloadedRSLs
method.description:
The RSLs loaded by this system manager before the application
starts. RSLs loaded by the application are not included in this list.

field.name: clippedGroup
field.description: Video and player controls are clipped if they exceed the size of the component, but the drop shadow above is not clipped and sizes to the component. We also set verticalScrollPosition so that when we do clip, rather than clipping off the bottom first, we clip off the top fist. This is so the player controls are still visible when we start clipping.
